From: (OPCL)" <1 
To: (ODAG)" 
Cc: 
ODAG 
(OPR 
(USANYS)" 
SAGAN)" 
(OPR)" 
Subject: RE: Victim Meeting Talking Points 
Date: Mon, 09 Nov 2020 21:27:37 +0000 
Attachments: x_Meeting_Agenda_and_Talking_Points_OPCL_Comments.docx 
Thanks Here are some redlines and comments from 
OPCL. 
Acting Chief Privacy and Civil Liberties Officer 
Office of the Deputy Attorney General 
United States Department of Justice 
From: (ODAG) 
Sent: Monday, November 09, 2020 12:17 AM 
To: (ODAG) ; (OPR); (OPR); (OPCL); 
(OLA) ; (USAGAN); (USANYS) 
Subject: Victim Meeting Talking Points 
Importance: High 
Attached for your review and comment are draft talking points for Thursday's victim briefing. I would really 
appreciate your input on topics I should avoid as well as topics I should expand more upon. Please send any and 
all comments by COB November 10. I really appreciate your help in preparing for this meeting. 
Associate Deputy Attorney General & 
National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking 
U.S. Department of Justice 
EFTA00029988
